item.title: Mild tension In Telanganaâ€™s Gadwal as villagers protest against ethanol plant
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad: Miled tension gripped Pedda Dhanwada village in Rajoli mandal of Jogulamba Gadwal district on Wednesday as large number of villagers launched a protest against the construction of an ethanol plant, leading to a dramatic confrontation at the project site.
The protest escalated when angry villagers stormed the site, tore down temporary shelters, and broke the windscreens of earth movers stationed there. The ethanol plant is being developed by Gayathri Renewable Fuels and Allied Industr...]]>

item.title: Telangana Protest: Farmers Set Fire to Block Ethanol Plant in Jogulamba Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Farmers oppose ethanol plant in Telangana's Jogulamba Gadwal district
The farmers have been resisting the ethanol plant's establishment, citing environmental concerns....]]>

item.title: Protest against ethanol plant turns violent in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[1
2
3
Hyderabad: Tension prevailed at Pedda Dhanwada of Jogulamba Gadwal district as an angry mob set a prefabricated container on fire, damaged a JCB and torched sheds in protest against the proposed ethanol factory.Hundreds of people, including women armed with sticks, marched to the area shouting slogans. However, the police used mild force to bring the situation under control. "We will not allow the factory to come up here. It will harm the environment and cause pollution," a villager...]]>
item.author: Tnn

item.title: Midnight scare in Gadwal as crocodile wanders into residential area
item.description:
<![CDATA[1
2
Hyderabad: In a startling incident, residents of hamali basthi in Gadwal town in Jogulamba Gadwal district were left alarmed after a crocodile appeared just outside a house during the early hours of June 3. While crocodile sightings near the Krishna river and Jurala project are not uncommon, this rare encounter within a residential area sparked concern.The crocodile was spotted around 1.30 am by a local railway employee who was stepping out for work after being alerted by persistent ba...]]>
